body_text: Did Sakura lose her virginity to Kakashi? I read it over the Internet that for an A-class ranked mission, Sakura teams up with Kakashi, her sensei, and according to the requirement of mission, she loses her virginity to Kakashi. Is this story true? I mean, had it actually happened in the manga?

Did Sakura lose her virginity to Kakashi? I read it over the Internet that for an A-class ranked mission, Sakura teams up with Kakashi, her sensei, and according to the requirement of mission, she loses her virginity to Kakashi. Is this story true? I mean, had it actually happened in the manga?
